sentences.english: This paper introduced the coke pushing and coal loading operating system in coke oven.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了焦爐推焦和裝煤操作系統內容。

sentences.english: It is necessary for coke oven gas making natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 提出了利用焦爐煤氣生產天然氣的必要性和緊迫性。

sentences.english: Blogs will fill every niche in the ecology of public writing.
sentences.chinese: Blog將會充滿了公衆寫作的每一個焦爐。

sentences.english: Misrun is the common defects found in oven door castings process.
sentences.chinese: 澆不足是焦爐爐門鑄件常見鑄造缺陷。

sentences.english: The hot repairing technologies of coke oven are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 對焦爐的熱態修理技術進行了分析。

sentences.english: The emissions produced during coke oven coal-charging contain pernicious gases, pollute the environment, and is harmful to human health.
sentences.chinese: 焦爐裝煤煙塵含有害物質，污染環境，危害人體健康。

sentences.english: The new technology for ammonia distillation in coke oven gas purification system and its characteristics are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了焦爐煤氣淨化系統蒸氨新工藝技術及其特點。

sentences.english: It was analyzed that the causes of the defects of misrun in oven door.
sentences.chinese: 澆不足是焦爐爐門鑄件常見鑄造缺陷。

sentences.english: The specific measures and suggestions on guarantying the silica brick quality for coke ovens are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了確保焦爐硅磚質量的具體措施和建議。

sentences.english: It supplies condition for coke oven heating combustion optimal control.
sentences.chinese: 爲實現焦爐加熱優化控制提供了前提條件。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduce the technical innovation of lowering the temperature of the basement of coke furnace of JISC by ventilating.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了酒鋼焦化廠焦爐地下室通風降溫技術改造成果。

sentences.english: The safe oxygen content in coke oven gas is now controversial.
sentences.chinese: 焦爐煤氣的安全含氧量目前存在一些異議。
